data.text:
Uwaaaa, there's so much snow～…! 
Carrying a package in all of this, and hiking up a mountain～?!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Uwaaaa, there's so much snow～…! 
<story>Carrying a package in all of this, and hiking up a mountain～?!

data.text:
(This trial is "To help find my strong point", 
according to Trainer-san. And McQueen-san is 
waiting at the summit for this generator)
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>(This trial is "To help find my strong point", 
<story>according to Trainer-san. And McQueen-san is 
<story>waiting at the summit for this generator)

data.text: Alright, I'll carry this, and properly return the favor-!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Alright, I'll carry this, and properly return the favor-!

data.text:
Well then, Trainer-san, all we have to do now is wait. But that 
was surprising. That was quite the spirited request for this 
kind of eccentric training.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Well then, Trainer-san, all we have to do now is wait. But that 
<story>was surprising. That was quite the spirited request for this 
<story>kind of eccentric training.

data.text:
To go so far to search for Kita-san's hidden abilities, 
seems like you're invested in this… But, traveling 
by foot is quite unreasonable.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>To go so far to search for Kita-san's hidden abilities, 
<story>seems like you're invested in this… But, traveling 
<story>by foot is quite unreasonable.

data.text:
Carrying a heavy burden and ascending a snowy mountain. An 
ordinary Uma Musume would reach their limit at around the "Third 
Station". Then for Kita-san who hasn't even debuted-
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Carrying a heavy burden and ascending a snowy mountain. An 
<story>ordinary Uma Musume would reach their limit at around the "Third 
<story>Station". Then for Kita-san who hasn't even debuted-

data.text:
Haa, haa… This… is really heavy… 
This might be harder than carrying a portable shrine…
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa… This… is really heavy… 
<story>This might be harder than carrying a portable shrine…

data.text:
But… I won't fail. 
I refuse to fail…!!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>But… I won't fail. 
<story>I refuse to fail…!!

data.text:
With Kita-san's current strength— 
She can probably reach the "Fifth Station", I would say.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>With Kita-san's current strength— 
<story>She can probably reach the "Fifth Station", I would say.

data.text:
Yes, that girl doesn't have any outstanding 
abilities right now. But… I can sense something that 
can't really be put in to words.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Yes, that girl doesn't have any outstanding 
<story>abilities right now. But… I can sense something that 
<story>can't really be put in to words.

data.text:
How should I put this, some kind of "Peculiarity". Which will 
take her to the Fourth Station. Her guts will carry her to the 
Fifth. That will be her limit. Which is still quite remarkable.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>How should I put this, some kind of "Peculiarity". Which will 
<story>take her to the Fourth Station. Her guts will carry her to the 
<story>Fifth. That will be her limit. Which is still quite remarkable.

data.text:
Uuu… I can barely focus… Even though I've barely passed the 
half way point… Is this as… far as I go…?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Uuu… I can barely focus… Even though I've barely passed the 
<story>half way point… Is this as… far as I go…?

data.text:
Even though… Trainer-san went through all the trouble to 
prepare this for me. McQueen-san is waiting for me too. Is it 
fine… to give up here?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Even though… Trainer-san went through all the trouble to 
<story>prepare this for me. McQueen-san is waiting for me too. Is it 
<story>fine… to give up here?

data.text:
(No, it's not fine. Not returning the kindness given to them… 
Dad and his disciples, would rather die than let that happen.)
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>(No, it's not fine. Not returning the kindness given to them… 
<story>Dad and his disciples, would rather die than let that happen.)

data.text:
(Without even returning one favor. One more step 
forward. Until the very end, I need to carry on, 
otherwise I won't be me! That's why-)
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>(Without even returning one favor. One more step 
<story>forward. Until the very end, I need to carry on, 
<story>otherwise I won't be me! That's why-)

data.text:
Uoooooooooo, like hell I'll give uuuuup! Not until the very end, 
not until the very last momeeeeent!! Eyaaaaaa, C'mooooooon!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Uoooooooooo, like hell I'll give uuuuup! Not until the very end, 
<story>not until the very last momeeeeent!! Eyaaaaaa, C'mooooooon!

data.text:
The sun is setting already… 
We should probably end it here.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>The sun is setting already… 
<story>We should probably end it here.

data.text:
Most likely, she's probably unable to move just past the Fifth 
station. We should probably contact the observation staff, and 
have them carry her to a nearby rest stop…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Most likely, she's probably unable to move just past the Fifth 
<story>station. We should probably contact the observation staff, and 
<story>have them carry her to a nearby rest stop…

data.text: W-what's wrong, all of a sudden?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

choices.text: I knew it… it's just like I thought
I knew it… it's just like I thought

data.processed: <story>W-what's wrong, all of a sudden?

data.text:
McQueen-san, sorry I'm late!! 
The generator… I've brought it!! Haa, haa, haa…!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>McQueen-san, sorry I'm late!! 
<story>The generator… I've brought it!! Haa, haa, haa…!

data.text:
K-Kita-san…! 
You made it here… all on your own?!
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>K-Kita-san…! 
<story>You made it here… all on your own?!

data.text:
Yes! It was way tougher than I thought, and it took quite a long 
time. But if this repays the favor even a little…!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Yes! It was way tougher than I thought, and it took quite a long 
<story>time. But if this repays the favor even a little…!

data.text:
Trainer-san, thank you very much for the special training! And 
also… have you figured out what my strong points are with this?
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, thank you very much for the special training! And 
<story>also… have you figured out what my strong points are with this?

data.text:
Through this harsh trial, Kitasan Black's 
strong point has become clear.
data.processed:
<story>Through this harsh trial, Kitasan Black's 
<story>strong point has become clear.

data.text:
Able to carry a heavy object up a snowy mountain with a "Strong 
Body", and quick recovery "Resilience". Never giving up, 
"Willpower". In other words-
data.processed:
<story>Able to carry a heavy object up a snowy mountain with a "Strong 
<story>Body", and quick recovery "Resilience". Never giving up, 
<story>"Willpower". In other words-

data.text: Toughness-! That's my-!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed: <story>Toughness-! That's my-!

data.text:
Without a doubt. Completing something as reckless as this, 
there aren't any other Uma Musume with that level of toughness.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Without a doubt. Completing something as reckless as this, 
<story>there aren't any other Uma Musume with that level of toughness.

data.text:
I see～. But, is toughness something you can really 
use in a race? It doesn't really seem like it 
has any effect on speed, does it…?
data.name: Kitasan Black

choices.text: It's more important for "Before" a race

data.processed:
<story>I see～. But, is toughness something you can really 
<story>use in a race? It doesn't really seem like it 
<story>has any effect on speed, does it…?

data.text:
Before a race? So something to do with preparations before a 
race… Ah! I see, you mean something like this?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Before a race? So something to do with preparations before a 
<story>race… Ah! I see, you mean something like this?

data.text:
By having Kita-san do some absurd training, 
you plan to make use of this ability? Just like Bourbon-san…?
data.name: Mejiro McQueen

choices.text: That's right! We'll make use of that trait
choices.processed: <size=41>That's right! We'll make use of that trait</size>

choices.text: That's right! We'll make use of that trait
choices.processed: <size=41>That's right! We'll make use of that trait</size>

data.processed:
<story>By having Kita-san do some absurd training, 
<story>you plan to make use of this ability? Just like Bourbon-san…?

data.text:
Waaa! Yes, please do!! Please help me build up my strength! 
Build me up into something that will never lose to anyone!!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Waaa! Yes, please do!! Please help me build up my strength! 
<story>Build me up into something that will never lose to anyone!!

data.text:
Trainer-san, McQueen-san, thank you very much! 
With this, I've got some hope!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, McQueen-san, thank you very much! 
<story>With this, I've got some hope!

data.text:
From now on, I'll train and keep on training, and make use of 
this strength — I want to try it out. To see if I can become 
strong enough to reach the person I admire most.
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>From now on, I'll train and keep on training, and make use of 
<story>this strength — I want to try it out. To see if I can become 
<story>strong enough to reach the person I admire most.

data.text:
I want to run together. 
With her- together with Tokai Teio-san!
data.name: Kitasan Black
data.processed:
<story>I want to run together. 
<story>With her- together with Tokai Teio-san!
